    index="museums",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "location": {
                "type": "point"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp2 = client.search(
    index="museums",
    size="0",
    query={
        "match": {
            "name": "musée"
        }
    },
    aggs={
        "viewport": {
            "cartesian_bounds": {
                "field": "location"
            }
        }
    },
)
